notion_entries.summary: Implemented complete local archive fallback system for session retrieval. Added intelligent fallback logic, enhanced caching, defensive error handling, and Shadow archive management.
notion_entries.key_decisions: Use local Shadow archives as fallback when Notion unavailable. Implement multi-layer caching (sessions, searches, agent history). Add comprehensive testing for all fallback scenarios.
notion_entries.next_steps: Create Notion export bridge system. Test complete fallback workflow. Document usage patterns. Consider automated sync scheduling.
notion_entries.full_context:
{
  "timestamp": "2025-10-30T17:00:00Z",
  "key_decisions": "Use local Shadow archives as fallback when Notion unavailable. Implement multi-layer caching (sessions, searches, agent history). Add comprehensive testing for all fallback scenarios.",
  "context": {
    "repository": "helix-unified",
    "branch": "claude/fix-retrieve-archived-sessions-011CUdmrWmyUSgVMqVTAKUVD",
    "features_added": [
      "Storage adapter retrieve_archive() function",
      "Memory Root local fallback logic",
      "Enhanced caching system",
      "Shadow collective archive loading",
      "Comprehensive test suite"
    ],
    "files_modified": [
      "backend/helix_storage_adapter_async.py",
      "backend/agents/memory_root.py",
      "backend/agents.py",
      "scripts/test_memory_root.py"
    ],
    "impact": "System now works without Notion access. Platform-independent session retrieval.",
    "ucf_alignment": {
      "harmony": 0.87,
      "resilience": 0.92,
      "drishti": 0.85
    }
  }
}

import_instructions.step_2: Paste into Main Claude (with Notion MCP access)
import_instructions.step_3: Ask Claude: 'Please import these context snapshots into Notion'
import_instructions.step_4: Claude will use MCP to create entries in the Context Snapshots database
import_instructions.note: Each entry will be deduplicated by Session ID
